name: Dark Space
description:
After crash-landing on an unknown space station, you find yourself stranded in darkness, alone. Uncover the mystery surrounding yourself, the station and other locations you visit by solving puzzles, overcoming unique challenges and defeating enemies in Dark Space an indie adventure side-scroller, created by just one developer.



  • Make your way through four chapters, each providing new environments and mechanics.
  • Uncover the mystery of a cryptic story.
  • Master your jetpack boost ability and use it to traverse the environment.
